Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "The hair is done up loose with a small accent braid that hangs down the side of the head."
"The hair is done up loose with small accent braids that hang down the sides of the head."
"Hair that is worn loose and interspersed with a slew of plaited and twisted dreadlocks which are then adorned with colorful beads."

"A long hairstyle in which luxurious waves are molded into bold definition and positioned to surround the face. The angled side partition provides an air of sophistication and elegance to the otherwise simple design."
", worn in long waves with an angled partition"
"A loose style in which the hair has been woven into a myriad of braids before being tied off at the ends with beads."

"This hairstyle starts with a classic bowl cut with tapered edges and chipped-in texturing. The locks on the sides and back are then styled into coils in order to add volume and movement in the look, while the top and forward portions of the hair are kept in smooth form to provide a pleasing contrast to the textured curl."
", worn in a bowl-like bob with billowing curls"
"A classic style in which the hair has been cut to chin-length and tapered inward to sleekly frame the face."

"The hair has been gathered at the base of the head before being tightly braided in a rope fashion and then bound securely with a decorative cloth. Tassles of tresses shoot out from the bottom of the binding to dangle downward."
", worn in a bound rope braid"

"Hair which has been cut, literally, in the shape of a bowl. Several inches of length remain on the top of the head while the bottom features a close-cropped style with no apparent transition between the two lengths."
"The tresses are tied off-center at the back of the head, widely braided, and then wrapped loosely about the crown before being decoratively knotted into a bun."
", worn in a braided wrap and bun"

"Hair which has been pulled up into a ponytail and then divided into two portions which have been individually braided. One braid is wound in a clockwise direction while the other is wound counterclockwise against the back of the head before being secured."
"The hair has been manipulated into a poufed dome atop the crown of the head, with a ribbon-laced wrap braid neatly framing its circumference."
"Hair that has been braided, rolled into an elegant knot, and then fastened at the nape of the neck."
"The hair is wholly gathered and tied up at the back of the head into a ponytail before being braided and secured anew, leaving a couple of inches of tresses hanging loose beneath the accessory."

"A partial up-do in which the hair has been styled into a braided arrangement with a stylish pouf on the front-top. The braid itself is coiled around the forehead like a headband with tufts of hair curling aside to frame the cheeks, while the remaining tresses fall freely in the back."
"Hair that has been split into three even portions before being neatly woven together to form a simple braid. It is secured at the bottom by a ribbon."
"A style in which the hair has been pulled back from the face, twisted or plaited, and wrapped in a circular coil around itself on the back of the head."
"A loose style featuring a myriad of incredibly intricate, dainty braids caging the hair back."
"The locks of hair seem to naturally flow downward in a cascade style."
"A male style in which the hair has been parted centrally at the front of the head to feather back above the ears. The remaining tresses are left unrestrained and hang down the back."
"A loose coiled bun which is worn low and secured against the nape of the neck."
"Hair done in a tidy braid that is wrapped once around the upper head to resemble a circlet. It is secured with pins and offers a sturdy anchor point for tiaras or veils."
", worn in a long, fringed side-part"

"This is a classic and casual male style. The hair is parted far to the left leaving a shorter side and a longer side. The longer side is swept to the right with the bangs laying in a loose wave on the forehead."

"Hair which has been gathered at the front before being intricately coiled. This style trails downward along the edges of the head before falling into a mass of elegant coils upon the nape which are discretely secured with hairpins."
", worn in a coiled nape knot"
"Hair done in a thick braid that is wound into a large, flat, wide bun around the top and back of the head."
"Hair which has been backwardly run through with a comb to create a neat, clean appearance."
"Hair which has been combed over a particular part on the head to hide a balding spot."
"A loose style featuring thick, glossy corkscrews of curls which drape exquisitely over the back."
"Hair that has been cut short on the sides and trimmed low on the top of the head."

"Intricate tiny waves have been created upon the head with elaborate crimping. An elaborate french twist has been formed, with the direction changing from the back to the side before rolling up balancedly towards the crown. Mild highlights bring energy to the base and enhance the tiny ruffles of the crimps that are scattered throughout the hair."
", worn in a crimped french twist"
"Hair which has been crimped throughout before being drawn up into a bouffant-like quiff. Small tufts of crimped fringe have been left free about the face to lend an air of elegance."
"An undulating style created close to the head which presents an even flow of impressive kinks and waves."
"a criss-crossed design trailing into a braided nape knot with loose tendrils"

"The larger majority of hair along the front and sides is elegantly criss-crossed before trailing downward to the base of the head where it is coiled into a braided nape knot. The remaining straight tresses loosely frame the face and neck in delicate tendrils."
", worn in a criss-crossed design trailing into a braided nape knot with loose tendrils"

"A bouquet of layered hair designed in a headdress of twists, curves, coils, spirals, rings and tendrils. The sides are brushed severely back to emphasize the mass convolution of loopy rolls that tower on the top and descend upon the back."
", worn in a bouquet of layered curls"
"a bun comprised of elegantly wound curls accented with flowers"
"The hair has been curled and elegantly wound into an intricate vine-like bun design against the nape before being laced with miniature flowers."
", worn in a vine-like bun design and accented with flowers"

"A festive and stunning upstyle that combines an elegant silhouette with wild and partially free flowing curls. The hair is twirled and fastened with invisible pins before the ends are shaped to perfection."
", worn in a festively curled upstyle"
"Hair that has been cut into short, soft layers which have been been subtly curled inward to frame the face."
"A style in which the hair has been brushed and manipulated into soft, loose curls."
"Two wide, thick braids wrap elaborately around the crown and back of the head with accented miniature rope braids threaded fancily throughout."
", worn in a double-braided crown with rope braid accents"
"A style in which the hair has been separated into two individually braided portions and then looped outward and attached underneath via pins to lend a draped appearance."
"A style in which the hair is either twisted into rope-like locks or consists of long, thin braids radiating from the scalp."
"An elaborate combination of two french braids on either side of the head which join toward the back of the head to form a braided bun."
"A sophisticated style in which the hair has been elegantly curled to spiral downward toward the back before pooling inward at the ends with sweeping, graceful curves."
"A style featuring an elaborate arrangement of fashionable twists that trail down one side of the head. The rest of the hair has been loosely curled and accented with miniature gems."
"Hair which is worn in a cascaded fashion and then intricately laced with arrays of fragrant blossoms."
"A combination of ringlets and coils ablaze in a swarm of loose, layered waves."
"Tiny braids that are randomly placed over the head."
"Tight curls that lie close to the head."
"Hair that is styled into waves that lie close to the head."
", which is styled into finger waves"

"Similar to the common french braid, the hair is differently threaded with thickness from the outer side to the center braid. It is tied off an inch or two before the ends of the hair with a ribbon or other accessory."
"An intricate, braided style created by using five strands of hair rather than three."
", worn in a five strand braid"
"The hair is shaved on the sides, with the top of the hair spiked upward and trimmed to look flat."

"An elaborate updo designed with textures ranging from tight to open that are displayed by a dense french braid framing the upper part of the face, then a softer weaving that transitions to a loose and casual top. One long braid smoothly falls behind the ear and to the side, lending a stylish, asymmetrical touch to the hairstyle."
", worn in a french braid with a long accent"

"A classic style in which the braid starts with small sections of hair at the crown of the head and is intermittently joined with more locks as it progresses downward. The end is secured with a ribbon or tie and features a small amount of hair left free at the bottom."

"A style in which the hair has been french twisted up with the leftover ends being dramatically curled and resting against the top of the head. The back is traditionally secured with hair combs or hairpins and can be dressed up with the addition of flowers."
", worn in a french twist with curls"
"A simple and elegant style created by gathering the hair into a low ponytail and then twisting it upward until it inverts against the head. It is then secured with pins, clips, sticks, or a comb."

"braids, braided, bun, dreadlocks, loose, mussed, pigtails, shaved, tangled, tousled, uncombed, windblown, combover, uncombed, mussed, tangled, combed, loose, ponytail, windblown, combed-back, crew-cut, pigtails, pulled-back, rolled-back, braided, accent-braid, tousled, flat-top, bobbed, flipped, flip-through, worn-up, french-twist, bun, two-braids, french-braid, braided-bun, circlet-braid, crimped, loose-bangs, top-knot, nape-knot, dutch-braid, pageboy, plaited, tendrils, mullet, shag, rope-braid, herringbone, tiara-braid, fashionably-laced, five-strand-braid, chignon, ringlets, layered, spiked, whorled-buns, draped-braids, laced-back, beaded-braids, cascade, pompadour, coiled, looped-braids, gorgette-braids, halo-braid, caged-braids, elegant-spirals, fashionable-twists, spikes, tight-rows, slicked-back, ribboned-fey-braids, pulled-back-with-bangs, pulled-back-with-flowers, stylishly-layered, layered-with-bangs, layered-with-swoop, curled-with-layers, bowl-cut, ponytail-with-bangs, roo-cut, swept-crop, natural-wave, classic-sidepart"

"A sweep of bangs drape featherly over the right brow with the remaining tresses brought about the crown of the head where the under layer is thickly braided to encircle the delicately curled upper layer of hair."
", worn in gathered curls with swooped bangs"
"Hair that has been swept back at the nape into a pile of loosely gathered tendrils."

"Thin, wispy locks frame the face while the majority of tresses have been neatly collected at the back of the head and plaited into a series of vertical basket-weave, or grid braids. A single rope braid squarely surrounds this unique design before tying off at the nape to secure the hair in place."
", worn in an elaborate grid braid"
"A thick braid that is coiled high upon the crown of the head in a circular fashion."
"An elegant arrangement of loose curls frame the face while an off-center halo braid slackly encircles the front of the head."
", worn in a halo braid with curls"
"This is a continuous, tight braid created down the center of the hair that resembles the shape of a herring bone."
"An array of knotted locks are neatly arranged in what looks like a net criss-crossing toward the back from the front of the head before being twisted into a tight chignon."
"A style in which the hair has been loosely gathered at the lower base of the head and delicately laced back."
"A wild hairstyle in which layered tresses combine with massive amounts of spiral curls and waves to splash against the face and over the back."

"A long layered male hairstyle boasting a body wave to present thickness and the spontaneity of curls. The locks are combed away from the face and over the ears to display the momentum of texture through light threads of hair that lie lightly over the rest of the bulk."

"Hair which has been cut into longer layers on the front and sides, and shorter layers in the back, to achieve a sleek, tapered effect. Cheek-length wispy bangs soften the style, gently curling inward to frame the face."

"A style in which the hair features short layers in the back, tapering inward toward the neck, and chin-length layers on the sides. The bangs have been arranged so that they swoop down over the forehead area before draping elegantly over one eyebrow."
", worn in layers with swooped bangs"

"A style in which the hair is arranged into layers, with the top layers cut shorter than the layers beneath. The tips of the upper layers blend seamlessly with the layers below, lending to an illusion of length and volume."

"A long, loose style in which the hair tapers in short layers about the face and nape before falling freely about the chest and middle back. Fringed, side-swept bangs complete the look with straight, stray tendrils resting delicately upon the opposing cheek."
", worn long and loose with short, tapered layers and side-swept bangs"
"Hair which is individually braided upon both sides of the head and then wound into loops."
"A style in which the hair is left to hang down, free of restraints, while a small mass of bangs cling to the forehead."

"A style in which the hair has been left free of restraints with the bottom half decorated in wide, elaborate curls. A single strand of hair has been streaked toward the front of the head to brighten up the face."
", worn loosely curled with a front-lying white streak"

"A soft, loose, and bouffant style in which the hair is smoothed into languid waves that tumble to the shoulders. The top section is straight and divides off-center into two portions. One section sweeps out in a graceful curve while the other plunges headlong down the forehead, across the eyebrow, and over the top of the cheek before melting into the main mass of locks."
", worn in a loose, bouffant style"
"A style in which the hair is left free of restraints and ties."
"A male hairstyle in which one lock of hair is kept longer than the rest. This single tress is tied with a ribbon and laid to the front of the left shoulder."
"The hair has been swiftly and unevenly collected before being tied up into a messy knot upon the back of the head to spare the wearer's eyes from obstruction."
"A style where the head is shaved save the very center going down to the neck. The hair in this area is spiked."
"Hair which is short on top and left long in the back."
"A style in which the hair has been deliberately ruffled to lend a disheveled appearance."
"A simple, elegant style in which the hair has been rolled into a knot and then swept under before being pinned securely at the nape of the neck."
"This relaxed male style features a naturally wavy top with bangs that sweep to the side of the face. The sides are cut short to emphasize the natural waves."
"A straight style featuring fringed bangs in which the hair hangs to just below the ear and turns under."

"Hair which has been centrally parted at the top of the forehead before being braided into two separate accent braids. These plaited arrangements are then drawn around the circumference of the head and secured in the back where the rest of the hair hangs unrestrained."
", worn pulled back with parted accents"
"A loose style in which the hair has been daintily curled and decorated with miniature pearls."
"This style features an even central part and two ponytails swept up and secured on both sides of the head."
"Hair which has been curled into ringlets before being piled high atop the head."
"A soft, flat braid created upon the lower portion of the head which progresses downward until it is secured by a ribbon or tie."
"An elegant hairstyle where the sides of the hair are combed back, while the top is fanned forward and curled over itself."
"Hair which has been pulled up and clasped, or pinned back, into a ponytail, with small chunks of bangs left loose in front to conceal the upper portion of the forehead and frame the eyes."
", worn in a ponytail with bangs"
"Hair which is lifted up and pulled back tightly before being secured with a ribbon or clip."
"Hair which is pulled back except for a small braid which hangs down the side of the face."
", worn pulled back with an accent braid"
"This style features short bangs that are split into hefty chunks which conceal a good portion of the forehead. The rest of the hair has been swept back and pulled up with a hairclip or ribbon."

"A style in which the hair has been elegantly pulled back and secured with a hairclip or ribbon. A myriad of small flowers have been carefully placed at the base of the hairstyle and then throughout the left side of the hair to create the image of a blossoming crescent moon."
", worn pulled back with flower accents"
"Hair which has been loosely gathered and simplistically pulled back at the base of the head where it is secured by a ribbon or hairclip."

"A long male hairstyle featuring razor-cut layers, focused along the leading edges of the sides. The fringe is parted off-center and angled, with the rest of the hair hanging loosely about the shoulders or back."

"This is a male style that looks both polished and carefree. The sides have been cut short but blend smoothly into the longer swept back top. A short fringe of bangs curls over the forehead to give a more relaxed feel."
", worn in a relaxed fringe style"

"A style in which the hair has been parted into two separate sections and french braided. A wide ribbon is then criss-crossed through the mid-section and wound downward before unifying the two braids and securing them in place."
"A whimsical style in which tiny braids threaded with multi-colored silk ribbons have been sporadically created upon the head."
"Hair which has been heated and curled to spiral downward in tight, continuous waves."
"A sexy style only Roo can pull off."
"Hair which has been pulled back into a three-sectioned ponytail before being twisted to the right and crossed over itself repeatedly to form a unique and elegant rope-like braid."

"Long, artfully curled strands of hair cascade back from the forehead before being drawn into an elaborate braid which drapes elegantly in front of the right-hand shoulder with a series of fresh pink rose blooms pinned in a strategic arrangement throughout. The braid itself, though the typical three strand, has been teased loose with larger loops before being pinned in place at the end with a single rose bloom."
", worn in an elaborate, rose-strung braid"

"A hairstyle which takes its inspiration from the classic bowl cut with its clearly defined terminus around the skull. The bottom edge of the style parallels the parietal ridge with a to-the-scalp cut beneath. The look includes the shadow of the traditional perimeter of the hair, and the upper sections are cut in a uniform length to create a velvety texture."

"A male style in which the layers end at the bottom of the nape and the ears are covered with a scrunched and deliberately unruly mass of locks. The side part and twisted fringe betray higher skills of grooming, leaving the overall look to be effortless and casual."

"A short, layered, loose hairstyle, with more layers at the crown of the head than below. The ears are not cut out so that the hair can be conveniently tucked behind or pulled back with barrettes or hairpins."
"A classic, short male cut featuring longer hair about the nape, narrow and short sideburns, short bangs and lots of texture. The hair is layered with greater lengths on the crown and neck."
", worn in short fringes with sideburns"

"A whimsical style where the hair has first been fastened back and away from the face by way of a large relaxed braid, allowing wisps of hair to frame the face. The remaining hair is swept to the side to create a low ponytail, leaving the rest of the hair to drape over the shoulder in a bed of soft curls."
"A fluid and dynamic male hairstyle cut into layers to create more volume on top. A hand-created wave decorates the left front of the head while neat lines trail around the sides."

"A deeply-textured asymmetrical bob style. The fringe area is curved downward to veil the right side of the face and carefully feathered with a razor to create a gentle upturn in the ends of the hair. The right side tapers to a point below the chin and is styled to form a petal shape that turns outward from the face. This is echoed in a shorter length by the left side of the style."
", worn in an asymmetrical bob with a side veil"
"Hair which has been considerably greased and then slicked backward to present a sleek, smooth appearance."

"A unisex hairstyle held together with a plaited strand of hair that begins at the forehead and snakes its way to the back as a tight, french braid. The locks from the front and sides together with about half of the back hair are gathered fashionably into a ponytail, while the rest of the hair is left to splash over the shoulders or back."
"Hair which has been swept up into a sophisticated bouffant, with elegantly-spun tendrils cascading about the neck and shoulders."

"A female hairstyle in which the locks have been widely braided and wound upon the crown of the head in a lengthy, spiraling fashion. Each braided loop has been decoratively strung with a black satin ribbon and strings of miniature black beads to create a complex spiderweb effect."
", worn in a ribbon-laced spiderweb bun"

"A male style in which longer hair decorates the crown of the head before being directed upward and towards the front. It starts at the very short and touchable nape and ends in a fashionable, spiked swell above the forehead."
"Hair which has been meticulously coaxed upward into miniature points to provide an edgy, daring look."

"A smart style in which the hair rises steeply, curling high and back from the hairline and reaching for the crown. The sides are combed straight back, thinly covering the top of the ears and bending in towards the neck."
"A style in which the hair has been cut into long, wispy layers before being swept back and gathered at the neckline with a clasp."
", worn in swept back, stylish layers"

"The hair has been divided into a partial, where a simple, braided bun has been pressed to the crown of the head with a series of pins, leaving the rest of the hair to frame the face and flow freely over the back and shoulders in a mess of natural, languid curls."
"This crop features a front laying fringe that sweeps over the forehead while most of the hair is cut short to highlight the slightly longer hair on top."

"The hair has been parted down the middle and collected into individual strands before being combed upward, rolled under, and invisibly pinned. From the back to the front, large, decorative swirls fashionably claim both sides of the head."
"Gathered in a loose bun, the hair is curled and situated in such a way as to provide the image of several tiers atop one another."

"A tightly-woven style in which the braided hair is pressed closely to the scalp, creating a decorative, raised surface. The hair is weaved over the crown of the head where it then splits into individually-created snug braids."
"The hair is completely cut from the scalp. This is a religious hairstyle that symbolizes the renunciation of worldly fashion and esteem."
"Hair which is styled into a knot on the top of the head."
"Tousled hair worn loose and adorned with randomly-scattered, multicolored beads."
", worn tousled and adorned with beads"
"Tousled hair worn loose and adorned with miniature flowers."
", worn tousled and adorned with flowers"
" Hair which hangs loose and appears to be in disarray."

"A glamorous upstyle in which the hair is parted on the side to create a long, silky sweep of bangs that cross the forehead in a wave, graze the eyebrow, and slip neatly behind the ear. The middle and back sections are drawn up and back into a tall arrangement of twists and knots that lend a surprising impression of simplicity."
"Hair which has been centrally parted and separated into two individual sections before being simplistically braided."
"Hair which has been left uncombed and tangled."

"An elegant bulge of the long frontal hair is just the prelude to the crescendo of long and luxurious curls, coiled to perfection right below the shoulders. The symmetry and simplicity are an open play in contrast to the extreme control on the lifted top section. This style boasts a free spirit with its open and flowing form, short side part and full volume."
"Hair which has been elaborately curled, upswept, and piled fashionably atop the head."
"The hair has been loosely swept from the nape and messily secured to the crown of the head with twigs and looped wildflowers. A mass of windblown bangs remain resting against the forehead."
"A male cut featuring textured layers styled into a windblown configuration with a hidden parting and forward-swept locks intimately framing the face."
"Hair which has been fluffed up and brushed back loosely, as if blown by the wind."
"Hair which has been pulled up and back with several small pins holding it in place."
